articles.author: NDTV Sports Desk
articles.title: "India Have Taken A Risk": Australia Great's Big 'T20 World Cup' Warning To Rohit Sharma And Co - NDTV Sports
articles.description: After two months of intense competitive cricket under night lights, the Indian cricket team, sans Virat Kohli, began its preparations for the T20 World Cup with a morning training session earlier this week.
articles.content: Former Australia captain Michael Clarke feels India have taken a huge risk heading into the T20 World Cup, saying that their heavy reliance on spinners might backfire. India have selected four spinne… [+1783 chars]
